line_2: Ye Sister Arts of PAINT and VERSE,

line_1: Than e'er bewail'd the melancholy Herse;
line_2: But yet, my Muse, if thou hadst softer Verse

line_1: Shall lie wrapt up, ev'n in my Herse:
line_2: My Answer to Thy dubious Verse.

line_1: Nor gaudy Scutchion daub'd thy early Herse,
line_2: Yet 'twas adorn'd with thy Clarinda's Verse:
